languages.text: "Увы. Наш Бог-Император находится на Святой Терре за многие световые века от нас. Лицезреть Его — привилегия единиц".

traits.locale_text: "Увы. Наш Бог-Император находится на Священной Терре за многие световые века от нас. Лицезреть Его — привилегия единиц".

languages.text: "Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Holy Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."
languages.original_text: "Увы. Наш Бог-Император находится на Святой Терре за многие световые века от нас. Лицезреть Его — привилегия единиц".

traits.locale_text: "Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Sacred Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."
"Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Sacred Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."
"Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Sacred Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."
"Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Holy Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."
"Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Holy Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."

languages.text: “很遗憾，我没见过。我们的神皇居住在神圣泰拉，距离这里无数光年之遥。除了极少数人之外，其他人都没见过祂。”
languages.original_text: "Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Holy Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，我没见过。我们的神皇居住在神圣泰拉，距离这里无数光年之遥。除了极少数人之外，其他人都没见过祂。”

languages.text: «Por desgracia no. Nuestro Dios Emperador reside en la Sagrada Terra, a muchos siglos luz de aquí. Contemplar Su semblante es un privilegio al que solo unos pocos tienen acceso».
languages.original_text: "Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Holy Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia no. Nuestro Dios Emperador reside en la Sagrada Terra, a muchos siglos luz de aquí. Contemplar Su semblante es un privilegio al que solo unos pocos tienen acceso».

languages.text: "Maalesef hayır. Tanrı İmparator, buradan ışık asırları uzaktaki Kutsal Terra'da ikamet eder. O'nu görmek, pek az kişiye bahşedilen bir ayrıcalıktır."
languages.original_text: "Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Holy Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."

traits.locale_text: "Maalesef hayır. Tanrı İmparator, buradan ışık asırları uzaktaki Kutsal Terra'da ikamet eder. O'nu görmek, pek az kişiye bahşedilen bir ayrıcalıktır."

languages.text: 「ああ、いや。神帝陛下は聖なる地球にお住まいで、何世紀光年も離れている。陛下に謁見することはほんの一握りに許された特権なのだ」
languages.original_text: "Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Holy Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、いや。神帝陛下は聖なる地球にお住まいで、何世紀光年も離れている。陛下に謁見することはほんの一握りに許された特権なのだ」

languages.text: « Hélas, non. Notre Empereur-Dieu réside sur la Sainte Terra, à des siècles lumières d'ici. Rares sont ceux qui ont le privilège de Le contempler. »
languages.original_text: "Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Holy Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."

traits.locale_text: « Hélas, non. Notre Empereur-Dieu réside sur la Sainte Terra, à des siècles lumières d'ici. Rares sont ceux qui ont le privilège de Le contempler. »

languages.text: "Leider nein. Unser Gottimperator residiert auf dem Heiligen Terra, viele Lichtjahrhunderte von hier entfernt. Ihn zu sehen, ist ein Privileg, das nur sehr wenigen vergönnt ist."
languages.original_text: "Alas, no. Our God-Emperor resides on Holy Terra, many light centuries from here. To behold Him is a privilege denied to all but a few."

traits.locale_text: "Leider nein. Unser Gottimperator residiert auf dem Heiligen Terra, viele Lichtjahrhunderte von hier entfernt. Ihn zu sehen, ist ein Privileg, das nur sehr wenigen vergönnt ist."
